value.title: Add/Append rows and columns to tables without merging using M in power query

value.title: Generate Year Month Day Combinations in Power BI Report using Power Query Date ToText Function
value.excerpt: A common requirement when reporting data with a Date axis is to be able to see the year and the month in a short form beside each other. value.title: Computing rolling average in DAX

value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI
